short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download an image by hovering over it's button!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Downloading images made easier!

Instructions:
On the top left corner of an image, there will be a red icon, hover over it to download the image.

The extension is currently in alpha,  so there are no features yet.
While the extension works, you can expect to see weird results in some websites, and in some websites, the extension won't work, cause of their type of rendering method used.

Feel free to give feedback!
